languages.text: Услышав ваше предложение, Рета облегченно вздыхает. Она и не надеялась, что Вольный Торговец будет столь щедр{mf||а} к обычным работягам. За считанные часы колония снимается с места и отправляется в новый дом — нижние палубы вашего корабля.
languages.translation_comment:
получить груз "люди"
после этого точка интереса недоступна

traits.locale_text: Услышав ваше предложение, Рета облегченно вздыхает. Она и не надеялась, что Вольный Торговец будет столь щедр{mf||а} к обычным работягам. За считанные часы колония снимается с места и отправляется в новый дом — нижние палубы вашего корабля.

languages.text: After listening to your offer, Reta lets out a sigh of relief. She dared not hope the Rogue Trader would be so generous to common workers. It takes the colony less than a few hours to pack up and move to a new home on the lower decks of your vessel.
languages.original_text: Услышав ваше предложение, Рета облегченно вздыхает. Она и не надеялась, что Вольный Торговец будет столь щедр{mf||а} к обычным работягам. За считанные часы колония снимается с места и отправляется в новый дом — нижние палубы вашего корабля.

traits.locale_text: After listening to your offer, Reta lets out a sigh of relief. She dared not hope the Rogue Trader would be so generous to common workers. It takes the colony less than a few hours to pack up and move to a new home at the lower decks of your vessel.

After listening to your offer, Reta lets out a sigh of relief. She dared not hope the Rogue Trader would be so generous to common workers. It takes the colony less than a few hours to pack up and move to a new home at the lower decks of your vessel.

After listening to your offer, Reta lets out a sigh of relief. She dared not hope the Rogue Trader would be so generous to common workers. It takes the colony less than a few hours to pack up and move to a new home on the lower decks of your vessel.

After listening to your offer, Reta lets out a sigh of relief. She dared not hope the Rogue Trader would be so generous to common workers. It takes the colony less than a few hours to pack up and move to a new home on the lower decks of your vessel.

After listening to your offer, Reta lets out a sigh of relief. She dared not hope the Rogue Trader would be so generous to common workers. It takes the colony less than a few hours to pack up and move to a new home on the lower decks of your vessel.

languages.text: 听到你的提议之后，蕾塔松了口气，她根本不敢希冀行商浪人竟会对普通工人如此慷慨。回收专员只花了几个小时就收拾好了行李，来到了你的船上，在底层甲板上安顿下来。
languages.original_text: After listening to your offer, Reta lets out a sigh of relief. She dared not hope the Rogue Trader would be so generous to common workers. It takes the colony less than a few hours to pack up and move to a new home on the lower decks of your vessel.

traits.locale_text: 听到你的提议之后，蕾塔松了口气，她根本不敢希冀行商浪人竟会对普通工人如此慷慨。回收专员只花了几个小时就收拾好了行李，来到了你的船上，在底层甲板上安顿下来。

languages.text: あなたの申し出を聞いて、レタは安堵のため息をつく。自由開拓者が一般労働者にこれほどまでに寛大になれるとは、考えもしなかったのだ。コロニーが荷造りをして、船の下甲板の新しい住処を移すのには、数時間もかからないはずだ。
languages.original_text: After listening to your offer, Reta lets out a sigh of relief. She dared not hope the Rogue Trader would be so generous to common workers. It takes the colony less than a few hours to pack up and move to a new home on the lower decks of your vessel.

traits.locale_text: あなたの申し出を聞いて、レタは安堵のため息をつく。自由開拓者が一般労働者にこれほどまでに寛大になれるとは、考えもしなかったのだ。コロニーが荷造りをして、船の下甲板の新しい住処を移すのには、数時間もかからないはずだ。

languages.text: Tras escuchar tu oferta, Reta deja escapar un suspiro de alivio. No se esperaba que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente fuera tan amable con los trabajadores corrientes. La colonia tarda menos de unas horas en hacer las maletas y trasladarse a un nuevo hogar en las cubiertas inferiores de tu nave.
languages.original_text: After listening to your offer, Reta lets out a sigh of relief. She dared not hope the Rogue Trader would be so generous to common workers. It takes the colony less than a few hours to pack up and move to a new home on the lower decks of your vessel.

traits.locale_text: Tras escuchar tu oferta, Reta deja escapar un suspiro de alivio. No se esperaba que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente fuera tan amable con los trabajadores corrientes. La colonia tarda menos de unas horas en hacer las maletas y trasladarse a un nuevo hogar en las cubiertas inferiores de tu nave.

languages.text: Nachdem Reta sich dein Angebot angehört hat, stöhnt sie erleichtert auf. Sie hatte nicht gewagt zu hoffen, dass {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} einfachen Arbeitern gegenüber so großzügig ist. Die Kolonie braucht nur ein paar Stunden, um zu packen und ihr neues Zuhause auf den Unterdecks deines Schiffs zu beziehen.
languages.original_text: After listening to your offer, Reta lets out a sigh of relief. She dared not hope the Rogue Trader would be so generous to common workers. It takes the colony less than a few hours to pack up and move to a new home on the lower decks of your vessel.

traits.locale_text: Nachdem Reta sich dein Angebot angehört hat, stöhnt sie erleichtert auf. Sie hatte nicht gewagt zu hoffen, dass {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} einfachen Arbeitern gegenüber so großzügig ist. Die Kolonie braucht nur ein paar Stunden, um zu packen und ihr neues Zuhause auf den Unterdecks deines Schiffs zu beziehen.

languages.text: Après avoir écouté votre offre, Reta lâche un soupir de soulagement. Elle n'osait pas espérer que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} ferait preuve d'une telle générosité envers de simples travailleurs. En l'espace de quelques heures, l'ensemble des colons plient bagage et investissent leurs nouveaux quartiers, sur les ponts inférieurs de votre vaisseau.
languages.original_text: After listening to your offer, Reta lets out a sigh of relief. She dared not hope the Rogue Trader would be so generous to common workers. It takes the colony less than a few hours to pack up and move to a new home on the lower decks of your vessel.

traits.locale_text: Après avoir écouté votre offre, Reta lâche un soupir de soulagement. Elle n'osait pas espérer que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} ferait preuve d'une telle générosité envers de simples travailleurs. En l'espace de quelques heures, l'ensemble des colons plient bagage et investissent leurs nouveaux quartiers, sur les ponts inférieurs de votre vaisseau.

получить груз "люди"
после этого точка интереса недоступна

languages.text: Teklifini dinleyen Reta, rahat bir nefes alıyor. Hür Tacir'in sıradan işçilere bu kadar nazik davranacağını ummaya cesaret edememişti. Koloni, birkaç saat içinde toparlanıp geminin alt güvertelerindeki yeni evine taşınıyor.
languages.original_text: After listening to your offer, Reta lets out a sigh of relief. She dared not hope the Rogue Trader would be so generous to common workers. It takes the colony less than a few hours to pack up and move to a new home on the lower decks of your vessel.
